channel.description: Welcome to the Emily Alfs-Votipka Pronouns: she/her 2161 Engineering Hall (working remotely) emilyalfs AT ksu DOT edu Other Instructors & TAs George "Bud" LaVezzi Joshua Weese Russell Feldhausen Nathan Bean Dr. Scott DeLoach s Please use for all course communication Image Credit: Codio Course Structure Lectures, Quizzes, Projects Gated - Must Complete in Order Work Around your Schedule Automated Grading Module 0 - Introduction Navigating Canvas & Codio Syllabus Where to Get Help Plagiarism Extra Credit Course Readiness Quiz Syllabus Contract Between Teacher & Student Read Carefully Ask Questions Diversity Statement Netiquette Subject to Change Late Work Each Module has a Due Date Complete ALL Work in Module Still Must Complete Module Don't Get Behind!
